com.uce.userlab.haptics.motion.event
Class MotionEvent

java.lang.Object
  com.uce.userlab.haptics.motion.event.MotionEvent

public class MotionEvent
extends java.lang.Object

This represents motion events that are fired by the Players and Recorders, it decribes the type of event and the state in which the player/recorder is in as well the device state.

See Also:
Device, PlayerListener, RecorderListener

Constructor Summary
MotionEvent(java.lang.Object source, java.lang.String message, double eventCode)
          Creates a new MotionEvent object to describe an event fired by a player/recorder
MotionEvent(java.lang.Object source, java.lang.String message, double eventCode, double[] pos, int step, java.lang.String state)
          Creates a new MotionEvent object to describe an event fired by a player/recorder
 
Method Summary
 double getEventCode()
          Returns the event code that identifies the event type
 double[] getLocation()
          Returns the location of the device at the time of the event is fired
 java.lang.String getMessage()
          Returns the message describing the event
 java.lang.Object getSource()
          Returns the source Object that fired this event
 java.lang.String getState()
          Returns the state that the source object is in at the time of the event is fired
 int getStepNumber()
          Returns the step number the source object is on at the time of the event is fired
 java.lang.String toString()
          Returns a String describing the event and its attributes

Constructor Detail

MotionEvent

public MotionEvent(java.lang.Object source,
                   java.lang.String message,
                   double eventCode)
Creates a new MotionEvent object to describe an event fired by a player/recorder

Parameters:
source - The source object that has fired this event
message - The message describing the event
eventCode - The event code to identify the type of event

MotionEvent

public MotionEvent(java.lang.Object source,
                   java.lang.String message,
                   double eventCode,
                   double[] pos,
                   int step,
                   java.lang.String state)
Creates a new MotionEvent object to describe an event fired by a player/recorder

Parameters:
source - The source object that has fired this event
message - The message describing the event
eventCode - The event code to identify the type of event
pos - The position the source objects's device is set to at the time the event is fired
step - The steps made by the source object at the time of the event is fired
state - The description of the state that the source object is in
